file.name: azure.com-sql-elasticPools-2014-04-01-swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: Provides create, read, update and delete functionality for Azure SQL
    Database elastic pools.
  title: Azure SQL Database
  version: 2014-04-01
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - cloud
  x-logo:
    url: https://assets.onestore.ms/cdnfiles/onestorerolling-1606-01000/shell/v3/images/logo/microsoft.png
  x-origin:
    - format: swagger
      url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/azure-rest-api-specs/master/specification/sql/resource-manager/Microsoft.Sql/stable/2014-04-01/elasticPools.json
      version: "2.0"
  x-preferred: false
  x-providerName: azure.com
  x-serviceName: sql-elasticPools
  x-tags:
    - Azure
    - Microsoft
paths:
  "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/{serverName}/elasticPools":
    get:
      description: Returns a list of elastic pools in a server.
      operationId: ElasticPools_ListByServer
      parameters:
        - description: The API version to use for the request.
          in: query
          name: api-version
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: client
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            List elastic pools:
              value: 2014-04-01
        - description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.
          in: path
          name: subscriptionId
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: client
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            List elastic pools:
              value: 00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444
        - description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can
            obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
          in: path
          name: resourceGroupName
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            List elastic pools:
              value: sqlcrudtest-2369
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ServerNameParameter"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ElasticPoolListResult"
              examples:
                List elastic pools:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/List_elastic_pools"
      tags:
        - ElasticPools
      x-ms-pageable: {}
  "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/{serverName}/elasticPools/{elasticPoolName}":
    delete:
      description: Deletes the elastic pool.
      operationId: ElasticPools_Delete
      parameters:
        - description: The API version to use for the request.
          in: query
          name: api-version
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: client
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Delete elastic pool:
              value: 2014-04-01
        - description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.
          in: path
          name: subscriptionId
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: client
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Delete elastic pool:
              value: 00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444
        - description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can
            obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
          in: path
          name: resourceGroupName
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Delete elastic pool:
              value: sqlcrudtest-3129
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ServerNameParameter"
        - description: The name of the elastic pool to be deleted.
          in: path
          name: elasticPoolName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Delete elastic pool:
              value: sqlcrudtest-3851
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "204":
          description: Accepted
      tags:
        - ElasticPools
    get:
      description: Gets an elastic pool.
      operationId: ElasticPools_Get
      parameters:
        - description: The API version to use for the request.
          in: query
          name: api-version
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: client
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get elastic pool:
              value: 2014-04-01
        - description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.
          in: path
          name: subscriptionId
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: client
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get elastic pool:
              value: 00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444
        - description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can
            obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
          in: path
          name: resourceGroupName
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get elastic pool:
              value: sqlcrudtest-2369
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ServerNameParameter"
        - description: The name of the elastic pool to be retrieved.
          in: path
          name: elasticPoolName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get elastic pool:
              value: sqlcrudtest-8102
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ElasticPool"
              examples:
                Get elastic pool:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Get_elastic_pool"
      tags:
        - ElasticPools
    patch:
      description: Updates an existing elastic pool.
      operationId: ElasticPools_Update
      parameters:
        - description: The API version to use for the request.
          in: query
          name: api-version
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: client
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Update elastic pool max:
              value: 2014-04-01
            Update elastic pool min:
              value: 2014-04-01
        - description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.
          in: path
          name: subscriptionId
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: client
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Update elastic pool max:
              value: 00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444
            Update elastic pool min:
              value: 00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444
        - description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can
            obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
          in: path
          name: resourceGroupName
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Update elastic pool max:
              value: sqlcrudtest-2369
            Update elastic pool min:
              value: sqlcrudtest-2369
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ServerNameParameter"
        - description: The name of the elastic pool to be updated.
          in: path
          name: elasticPoolName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Update elastic pool max:
              value: sqlcrudtest-8102
            Update elastic pool min:
              value: sqlcrudtest-8102
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/ElasticPoolUpdate"
        description: The required parameters for updating an elastic pool.
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ElasticPool"
              examples:
                Update elastic pool max:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Update_elastic_pool_max"
                Update elastic pool min:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Update_elastic_pool_min"
        "202":
          description: Accepted
      tags:
        - ElasticPools
      x-ms-long-running-operation: true
    put:
      description: Creates a new elastic pool or updates an existing elastic pool.
      operationId: ElasticPools_CreateOrUpdate
      parameters:
        - description: The API version to use for the request.
          in: query
          name: api-version
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: client
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Create elastic pool max:
              value: 2014-04-01
            Create elastic pool min:
              value: 2014-04-01
        - description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.
          in: path
          name: subscriptionId
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: client
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Create elastic pool max:
              value: 00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444
            Create elastic pool min:
              value: 00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444
        - description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can
            obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
          in: path
          name: resourceGroupName
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Create elastic pool max:
              value: sqlcrudtest-2369
            Create elastic pool min:
              value: sqlcrudtest-2369
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ServerNameParameter"
        - description: The name of the elastic pool to be operated on (updated or created).
          in: path
          name: elasticPoolName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Create elastic pool max:
              value: sqlcrudtest-8102
            Create elastic pool min:
              value: sqlcrudtest-8102
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/ElasticPool"
        description: The required parameters for creating or updating an elastic pool.
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ElasticPool"
              examples:
                Create elastic pool max:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Create_elastic_pool_max"
                Create elastic pool min:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Create_elastic_pool_min"
        "201":
          description: Created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ElasticPool"
              examples:
                Create elastic pool max:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Create_elastic_pool_max"
                Create elastic pool min:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Create_elastic_pool_min"
        "202":
          description: Accepted
      tags:
        - ElasticPools
      x-ms-long-running-operation: true
servers:
  - url: https://management.azure.com
components:
  examples:
    List_elastic_pools:
      value:
        value:
          - id: /subscriptions/00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444/resourceGroups/sqlcrudtest-2369/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sqlcrudtest-8069/elasticPools/sqlcrudtest-2729
            location: Japan East
            name: sqlcrudtest-2729
            properties:
              creationDate: 2017-02-10T01:27:21.32Z
              databaseDtuMax: 5
              databaseDtuMin: 0
              dtu: 50
              edition: Basic
              state: Ready
              storageMB: 5000
            type: Microsoft.Sql/servers/elasticPools
          - id: /subscriptions/00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444/resourceGroups/sqlcrudtest-2369/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sqlcrudtest-8069/elasticPools/sqlcrudtest-3191
            location: Japan East
            name: sqlcrudtest-3191
            properties:
              creationDate: 2017-02-10T01:26:26.45Z
              databaseDtuMax: 5
              databaseDtuMin: 0
              dtu: 50
              edition: Basic
              state: Ready
              storageMB: 5000
            type: Microsoft.Sql/servers/elasticPools
          - id: /subscriptions/00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444/resourceGroups/sqlcrudtest-2369/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sqlcrudtest-8069/elasticPools/sqlcrudtest-8102
            location: Japan East
            name: sqlcrudtest-8102
            properties:
              creationDate: 2017-02-10T01:25:25.033Z
              databaseDtuMax: 5
              databaseDtuMin: 0
              dtu: 50
              edition: Basic
              state: Ready
              storageMB: 5000
            type: Microsoft.Sql/servers/elasticPools
    Get_elastic_pool:
      value:
        id: /subscriptions/00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444/resourceGroups/sqlcrudtest-2369/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sqlcrudtest-8069/elasticPools/sqlcrudtest-8102
        location: Japan East
        name: sqlcrudtest-8102
        properties:
          creationDate: 2017-02-10T01:25:25.033Z
          databaseDtuMax: 5
          databaseDtuMin: 0
          dtu: 50
          edition: Basic
          state: Ready
          storageMB: 5000
        type: Microsoft.Sql/servers/elasticPools
    Update_elastic_pool_max:
      value:
        id: /subscriptions/00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444/resourceGroups/sqlcrudtest-2369/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sqlcrudtest-8069/elasticPools/sqlcrudtest-8102
        location: Japan East
        name: sqlcrudtest-8102
        properties:
          creationDate: 2017-02-10T01:25:25.033Z
          databaseDtuMax: 5
          databaseDtuMin: 0
          dtu: 50
          edition: Basic
          state: Ready
          storageMB: 5000
        type: Microsoft.Sql/servers/elasticPools
    Update_elastic_pool_min:
      value:
        id: /subscriptions/00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444/resourceGroups/sqlcrudtest-2369/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sqlcrudtest-8069/elasticPools/sqlcrudtest-8102
        location: Japan East
        name: sqlcrudtest-8102
        properties:
          creationDate: 2017-02-10T01:25:25.033Z
          databaseDtuMax: 5
          databaseDtuMin: 0
          dtu: 50
          edition: Basic
          state: Ready
          storageMB: 5000
        type: Microsoft.Sql/servers/elasticPools
    Create_elastic_pool_max:
      value:
        id: /subscriptions/00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444/resourceGroups/sqlcrudtest-2369/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sqlcrudtest-8069/elasticPools/sqlcrudtest-8102
        location: Japan East
        name: sqlcrudtest-8102
        properties:
          creationDate: 2017-02-10T01:25:25.033Z
          databaseDtuMax: 5
          databaseDtuMin: 0
          dtu: 50
          edition: Basic
          state: Ready
          storageMB: 5000
        type: Microsoft.Sql/servers/elasticPools

      value:
        id: /subscriptions/00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444/resourceGroups/sqlcrudtest-2369/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sqlcrudtest-8069/elasticPools/sqlcrudtest-8102
        location: Japan East
        name: sqlcrudtest-8102
        properties:
          creationDate: 2017-02-10T01:25:25.033Z
          databaseDtuMax: 100
          databaseDtuMin: 0
          dtu: 100
          edition: Standard
          state: Ready
          storageMB: 102400
        type: Microsoft.Sql/servers/elasticPools
  parameters:
    DatabaseExpandParameter:
      description: "A comma separated list of child objects to expand in the response.
        Possible properties: serviceTierAdvisors, transparentDataEncryption."
      in: query
      name: $expand
      required: false
      x-ms-parameter-location: method
      schema:
        type: string
    ServerNameParameter:
      description: The name of the server.
      in: path
      name: serverName
      required: true
      x-ms-parameter-location: method
      schema:
        type: string
      examples:
        List elastic pools:
          value: sqlcrudtest-8069
        Delete elastic pool:
          value: sqlcrudtest-228
        Get elastic pool:
          value: sqlcrudtest-8069
        Update elastic pool max:
          value: sqlcrudtest-8069
        Update elastic pool min:
          value: sqlcrudtest-8069
        Create elastic pool max:
          value: sqlcrudtest-8069
        Create elastic pool min:
          value: sqlcrudtest-8069
    TransparentDataEncryptionNameParameter:
      description: The name of the transparent data encryption configuration.
      in: path
      name: transparentDataEncryptionName
      required: true
      x-ms-enum:
        modelAsString: true
        name: TransparentDataEncryptionName
      x-ms-parameter-location: method
      schema:
        type: string
        enum:
          - current
  securitySchemes:
    azure_auth:
      description: Azure Active Directory OAuth2 Flow
      type: oauth2
      flows:
        implicit:
          authorizationUrl: https://login.microsoftonline.com/common/oauth2/authorize
          scopes:
            user_impersonation: impersonate your user account
  schemas:
    ElasticPool:
      allOf:
        - allOf:
            - description: ARM resource.
              properties:
                id:
                  description: Resource ID.
                  readOnly: true
                  type: string
                name:
                  description: Resource name.
                  readOnly: true
                  type: string
                type:
                  description: Resource type.
                  readOnly: true
                  type: string
              type: object
              x-ms-azure-resource: true
          description: ARM tracked top level resource.
          properties:
            location:
              description: Resource location.
              type: string
              x-ms-mutability:
                - read
                - create
            tags:
              additionalProperties:
                type: string
              description: Resource tags.
              type: object
          required:
            - location
          type: object
      description: Represents a database elastic pool.
      properties:
        kind:
          description: Kind of elastic pool.  This is metadata used for the Azure portal
            experience.
          readOnly: true
          type: string
        properties:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ElasticPoolProperties"
    ElasticPoolListResult:
      description: Represents the response to a list elastic pool request.
      properties:
        value:
          description: The list of elastic pools hosted in the server.
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/ElasticPool"
          type: array
      required:
        - value
    ElasticPoolProperties:
      description: Represents the properties of an elastic pool.
      properties:
        creationDate:
          description: The creation date of the elastic pool (ISO8601 format).
          format: date-time
          readOnly: true
          type: string
        databaseDtuMax:
          description: The maximum DTU any one database can consume.
          format: int32
          type: integer
        databaseDtuMin:
          description: The minimum DTU all databases are guaranteed.
          format: int32
          type: integer
        dtu:
          description: The total shared DTU for the database elastic pool.
          format: int32
          type: integer
        edition:
          description: The edition of the elastic pool.
          enum:
            - Basic
            - Standard
            - Premium
            - GeneralPurpose
            - BusinessCritical
          type: string
          x-ms-enum:
            modelAsString: true
            name: ElasticPoolEdition
          x-ms-mutability:
            - create
            - read
        state:
          description: The state of the elastic pool.
          enum:
            - Creating
            - Ready
            - Disabled
          readOnly: true
          type: string
          x-ms-enum:
            modelAsString: true
            name: ElasticPoolState
        storageMB:
          description: Gets storage limit for the database elastic pool in MB.
          format: int32
          type: integer
        zoneRedundant:
          description: Whether or not this database elastic pool is zone redundant, which
            means the replicas of this database will be spread across multiple
            availability zones.
          type: boolean
    ElasticPoolUpdate:
      allOf:
        - description: ARM resource.
          properties:
            id:
              description: Resource ID.
              readOnly: true
              type: string
            name:
              description: Resource name.
              readOnly: true
              type: string
            type:
              description: Resource type.
              readOnly: true
              type: string
          type: object
          x-ms-azure-resource: true
      description: Represents an elastic pool update.
      properties:
        properties:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ElasticPoolProperties"
        tags:
          additionalProperties:
            type: string
          description: Resource tags.
          type: object
